Return the default float type, as a string.

@description
E.g. `'float16'`, `'float32'`, `'float64'`.

# Returns
String, the current default float type.

# Examples
```python
keras.config.floatx()
# 'float32'
```

@export
@seealso
+ <https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/config/floatx>
